rev.desc.rev.desc: Upgrade Utility: Support to upgrade to SM9.71
Refactor the sql to generate preupg.bin
Upgrade Utility: Support to upgrade to SM9.62
Refactor the sql to generate transfer.bin and preupg.bin
Upgrade Utility: Support to upgrade to SM9.62
Reduce the size of preupg.bin: Do NOT dump non-English format and scmessage to preupg.bin
AGMRQ10H43093 Smart Upgrade Utility I: Make smart upgrade utility for both classic and lightweight upgrade - part 1
Update log path
Optimize SM Apps Upgrade: Do not upgrade codes of Upgrade Utility during upgrade
Dump enclapplrev into preupg.bin
Upgrade error when apply customer patch in customer PDO DB
Dump ScriptLibrary security when create custom upgrade
Dump ScriptLibrary idolUpgrade which is not related with this CR.
Workflow.mergeObjectWorkflow doesn't exist when apply custom upgrade
Dump ScriptLibrary Underscore*.
Workflow.mergeObjectWorkflow doesn't exist when apply custom upgrade
Dump ScriptLibrary Underscore as it is included by c.
Workflow.mergeObjectWorkflow doesn't exist when apply custom upgrade
When create custom upgrade, dump ScriptLibrary Workflow and objectHelper
Workflow.mergeObjectWorkflow doesn't exist when apply custom upgrade
Dump ScriptLibrary Promise as it is included by c.
Workflow.mergeObjectWorkflow doesn't exist when apply custom upgrade
Dump ScriptLibrary Workflow
Error occurred when apply production upgrade if the application version is 9.31 or lower
Dump ScriptLibrary StringUtil
Optimize SM Apps Upgrade steps: allow not to execute purge manually
Remove upgradetoc from preupg.bin
Update codes to support upgrade from 9.3x PD to 9.40
Export ScriptLibrary ProcessDesignerEnablement and c to preupg.bin
Export upgradetoc to force to use new dbdict
After upgrading from 9.30 app to 9.31 app, KMUpdate has an error "XML.setContent(): XML document failed to parse" by events from SCAUTO integration
tzFunctions invokes the functions in operatorUtil so operatorUtil need to be added in upgrade basic pacakge.
Date Format issue causes signal 11 when upgrade Applications from 9.20 to 9.32.
Add the ScriptLibrary tzFunctions to dump to transfer.bin
Remove the upgreconcliation dbdict also
remove the systemperform dbdict and change the option of upgreconcliation dbdict
build the js:ArrayUtil into transfer.bin
no need to dump extaccess.unl since no need to load extaccess.unl during load transfer
Removal of panels dump.approvaldef, dump.cm3rcat, and cm3tcat. Modified dump.JS and setup.queries panels.
QCRQ1E53294: Modify the setup.queries panel , add Javascript Lib(DataTypeConst) and all upgrade related Lib into preupd.bin dump file.
add a javascript into preupd.bin dump to get around globallist trigger issue
Unloads files needed to support L10N
Unloads the extaccess dbdict for SC6.2 upgrade.
Remove unload of extaccess dbdict
DE3346 Unloads the extaccess dbdict for SC6.2
DE3095 Using correct variable ($L.approvaldef.sql) on dump approvaldef panel
DE3052 Changing call from $L.prepath to $L.pre.path
Adding upgradeDbdictMerge
Add the upgradeReconciliationHelper script to the build
DE2007 putting back cm3r/tcat and ApprovalDef
code and dbdicts related to the web services upgrade no longer needed.
Adding the upgradetoc to preupg.bin
